keys: le prestazioni hanno basato la valutazione.
resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>156857</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3341</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Implementing Performance-Based-Assessment in the EFL Classroom</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einführen von von Leistung-Gründen-Einschätzung
im EFL Klassenzimmer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mettre en application 
l'Exécution-Baser-Évaluation dans la salle de classe d'EFL</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Executando a Desempenho-Base-Avaliação na sala 
de aula de EFL</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Effettuare Prestazione-Bas-Valutazione nell'aula 
di EFL</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εφαρμογή της απόδοση-βασίζω-αξιολόγησης στην τάξη 
EFL</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Poner el Funcionamiento-Basar-Gravamen en 
ejecucio'n en la sala de clase de EFL</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The purpose of this article, which appears in the ETNI magazine RAG, is to suggest the basic steps the EFL teacher, can take to design and implement effective performance-based assessments in the EFL classroom.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">assessment</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">performance based assessment.</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Zweck dieses Artikels, der im ETNI Zeitschrift
LAPPEN erscheint, ist, die grundlegenden Jobsteps vorzuschlagen der 
EFL Lehrer, kann zum Design nehmen und wirkungsvolle 
Leistung-gegründete Einschätzungen im EFL Klassenzimmer einführen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le but de cet article, qui paraît dans le CHIFFON
de magazine d'ETNI, est de suggérer les étapes de base le professeur
d'EFL, peut prendre à la conception et mettre en application des 
évaluations exécution-basées pertinentes dans la salle de classe 
d'EFL.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A finalidade deste artigo, que se publica no PANO 
do compartimento de ETNI, é sugerir as etapas básicas o professor de
EFL, pode fazer exame ao projeto e executar avaliações 
desempenho-baseadas eficazes na sala de aula de EFL.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lo scopo di questo articolo, che è publicato nel 
PANNO dello scomparto di ETNI, è suggerire i punti di base 
l'insegnante di EFL, può prendere al disegno ed effettuare le 
valutazioni prestazione-basate efficaci nell'aula di EFL.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο σκοπός αυτού του άρθρου, που εμφανίζεται στο 
ΚΟΥΡΈΛΙ περιοδικών ETNI, είναι να προταθούν τα βασικά βήματα 
που ο δάσκαλος EFL, μπορεί να πάρει για να σχεδιάσει και να 
εφαρμόσει τις αποτελεσματικές απόδοση-βασισμένες στον 
αξιολογήσεις στην τάξη EFL.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El propósito de este artículo, que aparece en el
TRAPO del compartimiento de ETNI, es sugerir los pasos de progresión 
básicos el profesor de EFL, puede llevar el diseño y poner 
gravámenes en ejecucio'n funcionamiento-basados eficaces en la sala 
de clase de EFL.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einschätzung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leistung gründete Einschätzung.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">évaluation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'exécution a basé l'évaluation.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">avaliação</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">o desempenho baseou a avaliação.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">valutazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">le prestazioni hanno basato la valutazione.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αξιολόγηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βασισμένη στην απόδοση αξιολόγηση.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Inglés</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">gravamen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">el funcionamiento basó el gravamen.</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
